attributes.action: Resign for his absolute incomptence running the UK economy. Though never actually elected at General Election as the leader of a party, his financial mismanagement will haunt our children for years to come.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every commitment by this 'short term' government is ruining our children's future. Brown has no mandate and is 100% implicated in this latest 'boom then bust'. For this reason he should resign, call an election so we can have a say on how this crisis is handled. Simply throwing our money away now to shore up his short term popularity is damaging our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
